directions: Heat oil in heavy large skillet over medium heat. Add next 6 ingredients and sauté until onions are tender, about 15 minutes. Stir in parsley and basil. Season with salt and pepper. Add pasta; toss thoroughly. Divide pasta between 2 plates. Top each with half of goat cheese.
ingredients: 1 tablespoon chopped fresh basil or 1 teaspoon dried, crumbled
8 ounces spinach linguine or spaghetti, freshly cooked
4 ounces soft goat cheese (such as Montrachet), sliced
title: Spinach Linguine with Goat Cheese
